item.title: Spotify 被土耳其官员指控 "侮辱 "内容
item.description: 一位土耳其官员呼吁对 Spotify Technologies SA 采取法律行动，称该流媒体服务的内容不符合土耳其的文化和道德价值观。【原文：A Turkish official called for legal action against Spotify Technologies SA, saying the streaming service’s content isn’t in accord with the nation’s cultural and moral values.】

item.title: 声明草案显示金砖国家将谴责 "胁迫性 "关税
item.description: 金砖国家领导人准备在贸易关税、中东冲突和应对气候变化的必要性等问题上采取与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普相左的立场。【原文：BRICS leaders are poised to adopt a position at odds with US President Donald Trump on trade tariffs, aspects of conflict in the Middle East and the need to tackle climate change.】

item.title: 首席执行官去世后，戈德林接任 AGF，寻求稳定发展
item.description: 分析师对 AGF 管理有限公司首席执行官 Kevin McCreadie 的突然去世表示哀悼，并称赞该资产管理公司迅速制定了继任计划。【原文：Analysts are mourning the sudden death of Kevin McCreadie, AGF Management Ltd.’s chief executive officer, and praised the asset manager for swiftly enacting its succession plan.】

item.title: 英国央行泰勒警告贝利中性利率问题不容回避
item.description: 英国央行决策者艾伦-泰勒（Alan Taylor）表示，英国官员不能回避利率走向的问题，这是对行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）做法的直接挑战。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Alan Taylor said UK officials cannot sidestep the question of where interest rates will settle, in a direct challenge to Governor Andrew Bailey’s approach.】

item.title: 亚航在对法国进行国事访问时签下价值 120 亿美元的空客订单
item.description: 在马来西亚总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）结束其欧洲之行之际，亚洲航空公司（AirAsia Bhd）达成了购买多达 70 架增程空中客车 SE 喷气式飞机的临时协议，该协议价值可达 123 亿美元。【原文：AirAsia Bhd reached a tentative agreement to purchase as many as 70 extended-range Airbus SE jets as Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim wrapped up his European tour with a deal that could reach $12.3 billion in value.】

item.title: 加拿大 H&R 公司称正在洽谈潜在出售事宜
item.description: 加拿大最大的房地产上市公司之一 H&R 房地产投资信托公司正在与多方商讨一项可能导致出售的潜在交易。【原文：H&R Real Estate Investment Trust, one of Canada’s largest publicly traded real estate companies, is in discussions with multiple parties about a potential transaction that may result in a sale.】

item.title: SEBI 官员称印度简街调查将进一步扩大
item.description: 印度证券交易委员会的一位官员说，印度对简街集团涉嫌操纵交易的调查将在未来几个月扩大到其他主要股指，但没有提供调查何时结束的时间表。【原文：India’s investigation of alleged manipulative trades by Jane Street Group will expand to include other major stock indexes over the coming months, a Securities and Exchange Board of India official said, without providing a timeline of when the probe will end.】

item.title: 前 Janus Henderson 分析师因 WFH 内幕交易入狱
item.description: 周五，一名前 Janus Henderson Group Plc 分析师和他的妹妹被伦敦一名法官判定犯有洗钱和内幕交易罪，并被判处监禁。【原文：A former Janus Henderson Group Plc analyst and his sister were jailed by a London judge on Friday, after being found guilty of laundering money and insider dealing.】

item.title: 英国央行购买企业债券未能为企业提供帮助，员工文件发现
item.description: 根据英格兰银行自己的研究，该行 200 亿英镑（约合 273 亿美元）的企业债券购买计划未能降低借贷成本或促进一级市场的债券发行。【原文：The Bank of England’s £20 billion ($27.3 billion) of corporate bond purchases failed to lower borrowing costs or boost bond issuance in the primary market, according to the central bank’s own research.】

item.title: 斯塔默无处可去，夹在叛军和债券市场之间
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）陷入了政治叛乱和债券市场恐慌的两难境地。【原文：UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer is caught between a political rebellion and a jittery bond market.】

item.title: 出于对中国的担忧，美国计划限制马来西亚和泰国使用人工智能芯片
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府计划限制英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）等公司向马来西亚和泰国运送人工智能芯片，这是打击涉嫌向中国走私半导体的努力的一部分。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration plans to restrict shipments of AI chips from the likes of Nvidia Corp. to Malaysia and Thailand, part of an effort to crack down on suspected semiconductor smuggling into China.】

item.title: 葡萄牙股票从 2014 年危机中复苏，外国现金助其一臂之力
item.description: 葡萄牙股市创下 14 年新高，终于从该国现代史上最大银行倒闭后的损失中恢复过来。【原文：Portuguese stocks hit a 14-year high, finally recovering from losses that followed the biggest bank failure in the country’s modern history.】

item.title: 美国-瑞士贸易协议可能包含对医药征税的保证
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国和瑞士之间的贸易协议草案包含一项条款，即在正在进行的国家安全调查中，欧洲国家将获得优先待遇，以避免对医药出口征收关税。【原文：The draft of a trade accord between the US and Switzerland contains a provision that the European country will receive preferred treatment in the ongoing national-security investigations to avoid tariffs on pharma exports, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国达成协议重启林赛炼油厂的燃料输送
item.description: 英国已经达成协议，允许林赛炼油厂重新开始运送燃料。【原文：The UK has reached a deal that will allow deliveries of fuel to restart from the Lindsey refinery.】

item.title: 尽管出售 TSB，BBVA 仍将继续收购萨瓦德尔银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，即使在其竞争对手萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）本周出售英国分行之后，BBVA SA 仍将继续推进对该银行的收购。【原文：BBVA SA is set to push ahead with its takeover bid for Banco Sabadell SA, even after its rival’s move this week to sell its UK unit, according to people familiar with the mater.】

item.title: 据说未具名的友邦保险集团股东将出售 34 亿美元的股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，一位未公开姓名的友邦保险集团有限公司股东通过大宗交易出售了 268 亿港元（约合 34 亿美元）的保险公司股份，这是本市今年最大的出售交易之一。【原文：An undisclosed AIA Group Ltd. shareholder sold a HK$26.8 billion ($3.4 billion) stake in the insurer via block trades, according to people familiar with the matter, in one of the biggest disposals in the city this year.】

item.title: 南非在就业数据风波中权衡小企业注册事宜
item.description: 南非正在考虑为小型企业和非正规企业建立一个统计登记册，与此同时，有关该国劳动力统计数据编制方法的辩论也在持续进行。【原文：South Africa is considering developing a statistical register for small-scale and informal businesses, amid an ongoing debate about the methodology used to compile the country’s labor statistics.】

item.title: 印度计划对美国商品征收报复性关税，立场趋于强硬
item.description: 印度威胁要对一些美国商品征收关税，以报复华盛顿对汽车及其零部件征收更高的关税，这表明新德里的立场更加强硬，即使两国正在努力达成一项临时贸易协议。【原文：India has threatened to impose levies on some US goods in retaliation to Washington’s higher tariffs on automobiles and their components, signaling a tougher stance by New Delhi even as the two nations race to seal an interim trade deal.】

item.title: 谷歌拟在搜索中加入比价框以讨好欧盟
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司将提议在其页面顶部突出显示来自其他公司购物和旅游平台的搜索结果，以遵守欧盟《数字市场法》，避免被罚款。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google will propose highlighting search results from other companies’ shopping and travel platforms at the top of its page in an attempt to comply with the European Union’s Digital Markets Act and fend off fines, people familiar the matter said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行马赫卢夫称通胀预期稳固
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员加布里埃尔-马赫卢夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）表示，欧元区的通胀预期得到了很好的锚定，使得该地区在最近消费价格强劲增长期间避免了失业率的大幅上升。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf said inflation expectations in the euro area are well anchored and allowed the region to avoid large increases in unemployment during the most recent period of strong consumer-price growth.】

item.title: 津巴布韦黄金储备激增，ZiG今年升幅最大
item.description: 受金银产量激增和外汇储备增加的提振，津巴布韦黄金支持的 ZiG 兑美元汇率创下了今年以来的最佳单日涨幅。【原文：Zimbabwe’s gold-backed ZiG posted its best single-day gain against the dollar this year, boosted by surging bullion output and improved foreign currency reserves.】

item.title: 莫迪在金砖国家会议前吹捧经济增长，力图领导全球南方国家
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）正在对非洲和南美洲的五个国家进行访问，在金砖五国峰会召开之前，他将利用这次访问重申印度领导全球南部的雄心壮志。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi is using his ongoing tour of five nations across Africa and South America to reaffirm India’s leadership ambitions for the Global South, ahead of a BRICS summit.】

item.title: 金融科技公司期待加入沙特上市热潮，应对日益增长的需求
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，沙特阿拉伯有两家金融科技公司正准备在利雅得上市，希望利用王国对此类服务日益增长的需求。【原文：Two Saudi Arabian fintechs are preparing to list in Riyadh, people familiar with the matter said, looking to tap into growing demand for such services in the kingdom.】

item.title: 特朗普的税收方案限制可再生能源，而人工智能的电力需求却在飙升
item.description:
根据一项分析，该法案拔掉了超过 300 gigawatts 的风能和太阳能项目的插头，这些项目将一直建设到 2035 年。【原文：

The bill unplugs more than 300 gigawatts of wind and solar projects that would have been built through 2035, according to one analysis.

】

item.title: 报告称贸易协议可能使印度对美商品出口翻番
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）称，新德里与华盛顿之间达成的全面贸易协议将极大地促进南亚国家的出口和制造业，为持续增长铺平道路。【原文：A comprehensive trade deal between New Delhi and Washington could significantly boost the South Asian nation’s exports and manufacturing sector, paving the way for sustained growth, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 泰国称美国关税谈判在截止日期前 "进展顺利
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）表示，泰国与美国就互惠关税问题举行的首次部长级会谈进展顺利。【原文：Thailand’s first ministerial-level talks with the US about reciprocal tariffs went well, according to Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira, adding that an improved proposal is in the works as the Southeast Asian nation seeks a deal before the deadline next week.】

item.title: 嘻哈音乐剧颠覆硅谷创始人刻板印象
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，Ellen Huet 报道一部音乐剧，该剧为硅谷初创企业创始人的神话注入了新的色彩。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ellen Huet reports on a musical that puts a new spin on the myth of the Silicon Valley startup founder.】

item.title: 希腊财政恐怖秀已成为遥远的回忆
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林，法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们将关注维多利亚-登德里努（Viktoria Dendrinou）、索蒂里斯-尼卡斯（Sotiris Nikas）和保罗-塔格韦尔（Paul Tugwell）关于希腊的报道。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling , a senior editor in Frankfurt. Today we’re looking at Viktoria Dendrinou, Sotiris Nikas and Paul Tugwell’s reporting on Greece. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 碧桂园 6 月销售下滑加剧，前景黯淡
item.description: 由于缺乏政策支持抑制了需求，碧桂园控股有限公司 6 月份的销售额再次下滑，该开发商的表现逊于同行。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co.’s sales slid again in June, with the developer faring worse than peers, as a lack of policy support dampened demand.】

item.title: 据说CVC支持的FineToday将考虑重启东京IPO计划
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，FineToday 控股公司正在考虑重新启动在东京首次公开募股的计划，这家日本个人护理用品公司去年取消了此前的上市计划。【原文：FineToday Holdings Co. is considering reviving plans for an initial public offering in Tokyo, people familiar with the matter said, after the Japanese personal-care business canceled a previous attempt last year.】
